attributes.action: make safeguarding in schools stricter on its staff to protect our children correctly
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to look into the quality of teachers today, nowadays their is no professional line between what teachers tell their pupils about their personal lives. I can back this up by experiences I have faced, also I have closely assessed the way teachers behave in the school I attend. This of course does not apply to the teaching profession as a whole, however their are a few "professionals" that let down this profession.
